name: Delivery rate for Yamato transport
author: RESTA

sections.description:
In Japanese:

このプラグインはWooCommerceのためのヤマト運輸用の送料追加プラグインです。
ヤマト運輸の運賃一覧表を元に日本の地域ごと（北海道、北東北、南東北、関東・・・）送料を設定することができ、配送先の都道府県を元に設定された送料が表示されます。

In English:

This plug-in is for additional plug- ins for Yamato Transport for WooCommerce.
Each region of Japan based on the fare list of Yamato Transport ( Hokkaido ,
Tohoku North , South Tohoku , Kanto …) it is possible to set the postage ,
shipping , which is set based on the destination of the prefecture is
displayed you .
sections.installation:
・Upload \”delivery-rate-for-yamato.php\” to the \”/wp-content/plugins/\”
directory.
・Activate the plugin through the \”Plugins\” menu in WordPress.
・Go to the settings page to fine-tune the settings if desired.
sections.faq:
In Japanese:

日本以外の地域への配送で利用できますか？
いいえ、日本国内のみです。

Can I use in delivery to regions other than Japan ?

No, it is only in Japan .

short_description: This plug-in is for additional plug- ins for Yamato Transport for WooCommerce. You can set the postage for each region of Japan .
